Mindful Practices: Course 2
SEL Competencies and Experiential Practices

Self-Awareness

CASEL defines self-awareness as:

The abilities to understand one’s own emotions, thoughts, and values and how they influence behavior across contexts. This includes capacities to recognize one’s strengths and limitations with a well grounded sense of confidence and purpose.

Experiential Practice

Throughout this course we will be thinking about SEL using the CASEL definition:

POP Checks

POP Checks are a quick and simple way to give students an opportunity to practice self-awareness — to assess their own feelings and body sensations in the moment. It also allows the educator to get a measure of the students’ mood and energy level.

  • POP Check Script: Use this script to conduct Pop Checks with your students.
  • Practice Activities: Explore the Mindful Practices database of practice activities that can be used with students.
